meta.title: Layla JIN's Studio
meta.subtitle: You only live once
meta.description: You must strive to find your own voice
meta.author: Layla JIN

posts.title: Hi there
posts.content:
Hi, welcome to my blog!

I am a final year student in the Department of Electronic and Engineering at City University of Hong Kong. I minored in Computer Science due to my personal interest. Still, it’s just the start of my journey, and I wish to learn more.

I tried to put something interesting here, and may upload some blogs in the future. You can know more about me by checking the projects I did and activities I attended. Oh, don’t forget to click the “about me”, I have a lot to tell.

Anyway, nice to meet you :D
